code: import React from"react";import"./intro.css";import bg from"../../assets/images/linhImg.png";import{Link}from"react-scroll";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Intro=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"intro",className:"container-fluid d-flex align-items-center justify-content-between",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row w-100 align-items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"introContent col-md-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"hello",children:"Hello, "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{className:"introText",children:["I'm ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"introName",children:"Linh Klatt"})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"introPara",children:["Aspiring Full-Stack Developer | Software Engineering Student ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"Passionate about Web Technologies and Innovative Solutions"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"resume",smooth:true,duration:500,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Download Resume"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-6 d-none d-md-flex justify-content-end",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:bg,alt:"Profile",className:"bg img-fluid profile-img"})})]})});};export default Intro;
